entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
